name: SunMoon Verse Demo
description:
SunMoon Verse is a fantasy romance visual novel where you play as a magical veterinarian named Sunny moving to a mysterious, small town on the coast. 

☆ Info ☆

  • Playtime: ~40 Minutes
  • 1 Ending, linear

This is a conceptual demo for a larger project that I would like to make in the future. I hope you enjoy my silly, little game. :)

☆ Credits ☆

Thank you very much to Innlydian for these music tracks.

  • "A Walk"
  • "Copycat"
  • "Down Under"
  • "In the Garden"
  • "Swimming"

Thank you very much to Nighten for the  "Yet Another Phone" framework.

All other sound effects were either created by me using the Chiptone tool or are in the public domain.
